items.title: Happy New Year
items.description:
A big welcome to the New Year! We hope everyone had a magical holiday with family and friends. We here at Weekly Xamarin are looking forward to a fantastic year ahead and hope the same for each and every one of our readers.

Thanks for subscribing to the newsletter and enjoy your weekend.

❤

Kym

items.title: Publish smaller apps with the Android App Bundle
items.description:
The Android App Bundle (.aab) is a new upload format that includes all of your app’s compiled code and resources, but defers APK generation and signing to Google Play at install time.

Publish smaller apps with the Android App Bundle by Jon Douglas
items.description_markdown:

items.title: Understanding Margin, Padding and Translation
items.description:
Leomaris looks at the Padding and Margin properties in Xamarin.Forms, which in many ways are considered “equivalent” properties, but it is important to understand what the difference is and the result of applying one property or another.

Understanding the differences between Margin & Padding. and Translation properties by Leomaris Reyes
items.description_markdown:

items.title: Gradually moving from Xamarin Native to Xamarin.Forms
items.description:
Forms embedding allows you to bring pages written in Xamarin.Forms into Xamarin native projects. This has been around for quite a while and is just one of the many fantastic ways you can architect a Xamarin application. In this Andreas shares his real-world experience using it.

Gradually moving from Xamarin Native to Xamarin.Forms with Forms Embedding by Andreas Nesheim
items.description_markdown:
Forms embedding allows you to bring pages written in Xamarin.Forms into Xamarin native projects.  This has been around for quite a while and is just one of the many fantastic ways you can architect a Xamarin application.  In this Andreas shares his real-world experience using it.

[**Gradually moving from Xamarin Native to Xamarin.Forms with Forms Embedding**](https://www.andreasnesheim.no/gradually-moving-from-xamarin-native-to-xamarin-forms-with-forms-embedding/) by [Andreas Nesheim](https://www.andreasnesheim.no/author/andrnes/)
